trans-unit.source: Enable the script server to execute SAP HANA Automated Predictive Library (APL) and SAP HANA Predictive Analysis Library (PAL).

seg-source.mrk: Enable the script server to execute SAP HANA Automated Predictive Library (APL) and SAP HANA Predictive Analysis Library (PAL).

target.mrk: SAP HANA Automated Predictive Library(APL)와 SAP HANA Predictive Analysis Library(PAL)를 실행하기 위해 스크립트 서버를 활성화합니다.

trans-unit.source: To use SAP HANA Cloud machine learning libraries in <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/>, you first need to create a ticket. With this ticket and the information eintailed in it we can set up APL and PAL for you by creating the users and taking care of the required authorizations. Once the setup is finished an additional option on the user interface can be seen when creating or editing a database user. Select this option to allow your database user to use the SAP HANA Automated Predictive Library and SAP HANA Predictive Analysis Library.

seg-source.mrk: To use SAP HANA Cloud machine learning libraries in <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/>, you first need to create a ticket.
With this ticket and the information eintailed in it we can set up APL and PAL for you by creating the users and taking care of the required authorizations.
Once the setup is finished an additional option on the user interface can be seen when creating or editing a database user.
Select this option to allow your database user to use the SAP HANA Automated Predictive Library and SAP HANA Predictive Analysis Library.

target.mrk: <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/>에서 SAP HANA Cloud 기계 학습 라이브러리를 사용하려면 먼저 티켓을 생성해야 합니다.
SAP에서는 이 티켓과 티켓에 포함된 정보를 사용하여 사용자를 생성하고 필수 권한을 검토하여 사용자를 위한 APL과 PAL을 설정할 수 있습니다.
설정을 완료하면 데이터베이스 사용자를 생성하거나 편집할 때 사용자 인터페이스에 추가 옵션이 표시됩니다.
데이터베이스 사용자가 SAP HANA Automated Predictive Library와 SAP HANA Predictive Analysis Library를 사용할 수 있게 하려면 이 옵션을 선택합니다.

trans-unit.source: For a step-by-step guide to create an SAP ticket and enable the machine learning libraries take a look at this SAP Knowledge Base Article: <xref format="html" href="https://launchpad.support.sap.com/#/notes/2994416" scope="external">2994416 - Enablement of APL and PAL in DWC</xref>.

seg-source.mrk: For a step-by-step guide to create an SAP ticket and enable the machine learning libraries take a look at this SAP Knowledge Base Article:
<xref format="html" href="https://launchpad.support.sap.com/#/notes/2994416" scope="external">2994416 - Enablement of APL and PAL in DWC</xref>.

target.mrk: SAP 티켓을 생성하고 기계 학습 라이브러리를 사용하도록 설정하는 데 대한 단계별 가이드는 SAP Knowledge Base 문서
<xref format="html" href="https://launchpad.support.sap.com/#/notes/2994416" scope="external">2994416 - DWC에서 APL과 PAL 사용</xref>을 참조하십시오.

trans-unit.source: To find out more about APL and PAL please see the <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/7223667230cb471ea916200712a9c682/2101/en-US" scope="external">SAP HANA Automated Predictive Library Developer Guide</xref> and <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/319d36de4fd64ac3afbf91b1fb3ce8de/2020_03_QRC/en-US/c9eeed704f3f4ec39441434db8a874ad.html" scope="external">SAP HANA Cloud Predictive Analysis Library (PAL)</xref>.

seg-source.mrk: To find out more about APL and PAL please see the <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/7223667230cb471ea916200712a9c682/2101/en-US" scope="external">SAP HANA Automated Predictive Library Developer Guide</xref> and <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/319d36de4fd64ac3afbf91b1fb3ce8de/2020_03_QRC/en-US/c9eeed704f3f4ec39441434db8a874ad.html" scope="external">SAP HANA Cloud Predictive Analysis Library (PAL)</xref>.

target.mrk: APL과 PAL에 대한 자세한 내용은 <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/7223667230cb471ea916200712a9c682/2101/en-US" scope="external">SAP HANA Automated Predictive Library 개발자 가이드</xref>와 <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/319d36de4fd64ac3afbf91b1fb3ce8de/2020_03_QRC/en-US/c9eeed704f3f4ec39441434db8a874ad.html" scope="external">SAP HANA Cloud Predictive Analysis Library(PAL)</xref>를 참조하십시오.
